title: NYC: The Black & White Ball 12.5.15
desc: The Black & White Ball This season we're breaking out from ugly sweaters and office parties and adding a holiday event to your schedule that you'll be talking about for months! So put on your cocktail best and join The Ivy Plus Society and  Sparkology ? at?the exclusive Delancey Rooftop? for candy canes, cocktails, mistle toe and more!? Give your secret Santa an early gift by getting in for free with our Early Bird -?Buy One Get One Free Tickets! + Black/White Cocktail Attire Required +
